name: DOP 3: Displace One Part
description:
Hey! Join us and enjoy “DOP 3: Displace One Part” - a new addictive puzzle game, where you choose how to solve the riddles! Your goal is to move objects to the pictures, following logic and intuition. Let's try to complete all levels to develop IQ and brain skills.

Game Features:

- Freedom of interaction
Choose for yourself in what order and where to move objects. The reactions and emotions of the characters will definitely make you smile)

- Addictive gameplay
Each level is a mini story where you need to use your brain to find the solution.

- Beautiful graphics
Juicy, colorful levels to please your imagination!

- Great time killer!
No time limits, no hurry, just a relaxing journey of funny levels.

Download DOP 3, solve the puzzles and charge your brain now!
